'''Tofu''' is a [[Cooking Ingredient]] item used in recipes to create [[Food]] items.

==How to Obtain==
The following NPCs give Tofu after following a certain dialogue branch for the first time:
*[[Ms. Bai]] in [[Qingce Village]], [[Liyue]] (8 Tofu)
